original_title: لا تراجع و لا استسلام (القبضة الدامية)
overview: In this new action comedy, Ahmed Mekky takes on duel roles: "Adham", a wanted criminal and "Hazlaom", a poor man who just happens to be a perfect body double for Adham.
tagline: La Taragoa Wala Esteslam (El Kabda El Dameya)
title: No Retreat, No Surrender (Bloody Fest)
